text:
Question 157) Jo√£o decided to hire the services of a company by telephone through the consumer service service (SAC). The attendant dictated to John the number of calling protocol of the call and asked him to write down. However, John did not understand one of the numerals dictated by the attendant and noted the number 1 3 9 8 2 0 7, and the empty space is that of the digit that John did not understand.
According to this information, the position occupied by the missing number in the protocol number is that of
A) Hundred.
B) dozen thousands.
C) hundred thousands.
D) million.
E) hundred million.
